titles.title: Australia-United States Submarine Officer Pipeline Act
Australia-United States Submarine Officer Pipeline Act
A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense to establish a joint training pipeline between the United States Navy and the Royal Australian Navy, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Australia-United States Submarine Officer Pipeline Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to carry out an exchange program for Australian submarine officers. Under this program, two such officers shall be selected each year to receive training and, after completing such training, be assigned to duty on an operational U.S. submarine at sea.
